name: Derelict (itch) (Oakamoore)
description:
Derelict is a short walking simulator prototype about an astronaut tasked with repairing their ship following its collision with asteroids. After landing on a nearby uninhabitable planet with their ship’s life support having run out, and their oxygen supply running low, they must reboot their ship before time runs out.

This was made using Unreal Engine 4.27.2
